channel.title: Junit5 on Lee Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Junit5 on Lee Turner

item.title: BlinkyTape JUnit Testwatcher API Implementation
item.description: Every so often I like to have a play around with a part of Junit that I haven’t used before, and I recently decided to look into the TestWatcher API. I have to admit that I have been meaning to play with this for quite a while now…. I just haven’t really found a good use-case for it. Given that I decided to quit trying to find a good use-case and implement something nerdy instead.
